translation.en: ...inside the school. And then guess who found him?
Go over and tell her who you are and get her one coffee.
translation.es: Ve, preséntate y llévale un café.

translation.en: No, I don't have money for it.
- I'll pay for the coffee. Please? - He'll pay for it.
translation.es: - Yo pago. Por favor. - Él paga.

translation.en: She's looking at you. She's blushing.
She's blushing. Dude, she wants you.
- Go over and talk - No, no, no.
- That's Ovi, though. - Isn't that hilarious?
Hasn't your father told you to come straight home after school?
translation.es: ¿Tu padre no dijo que vinieras directo a casa?

translation.en: Hey! What's up? He talk to her yet?
Did you talk to her yet?
Did he talk to... Come on, Ovi. You gotta go talk to her.
I know what you need. Come on.
Try it. Take one hit, man, it'll help you.
I think you dropped something, no?
- No, it's not ours. - Chill. Relax.
You got your whole lives ahead of you.
I told you, you dumb motherfucker,
...and yet Amir Asif has grabbed my son.
translation.es: Y ahora Amir Asif se llevó a mi hijo.
No se trata de rescates, Saju.

translation.en: You think I can't hurt you from here?
translation.es: ¿Que no puedo hacerte daño desde aquí?

translation.en: You want your son to see his next birthday?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que tu hijo viva para su próximo cumpleaños?

translation.en: Tell Mahajan to pay the ransom and get his son back.
translation.es: Dile a Mahajan que pague y recupere a su hijo.

translation.en: Why are they getting us involved in this?
The NCB have frozen Mahajan's assets.
translation.es: La Agencia Antidrogas congeló sus bienes.

translation.en: There's a man who does this sort of thing.
translation.es: Hay un hombre que hace estas cosas.

translation.en: His price will be out of Mahajan's reach.
translation.es: Mahajan no podrá pagar lo que pide.

translation.en: But there's a way I can play this.
You sure, bruh? 'Cause he looks fuckin' dead.
- So? - It makes you sound stupid.
- Hold my beer, would you? - Oh, I gotcha.
- I said hold it. Don't drink it. - I gotcha.
There's a chicken in your bathroom.
translation.es: Hay una gallina en tu baño.

translation.en: Yeah, I like chickens, except when they shit everywhere.
translation.es: Me gustan las gallinas, salvo cuando cagan todo.

translation.en: Extraction. Indian kid. Drug lord's son.
translation.es: - ¿Sí? - Una extracción. Un chico indio. Hijo de un gran narco.

translation.en: A rival gangster is holding this kid in Dhaka.
translation.es: Un gánster rival tiene al chico en Dacca.

translation.en: I think Gaspar lives in Dhaka.
Gaspar is out of the game.
translation.es: Él ya no se dedica a esto.

translation.en: Clock's running at 16 hours. Deadline, Friday, noon.
translation.es: Empezamos a las 16:00. Plazo: viernes al mediodía.

translation.en: Proof of life as of six hours ago.
translation.es: Prueba de vida, hace seis horas.

translation.en: This gangster, Amir Asif, he holds a massive sway in Dhaka.
translation.es: Este gánster, Amir Asif, tiene un gran poder en Dacca.

translation.en: You get your hands on this kid, it's gonna get complicated.
translation.es: Si tocas a este chico, se pondrá complicado.

translation.en: Nik, what are you doing here? Don't bullshit yourself.
translation.es: Dios, Nik, ¿qué haces? Deja de engañarte.

translation.en: No one else is gonna commit to somethin' this fucked up.
translation.es: Nadie más va a aceptar algo tan jodido.

translation.en: You're hoping if you spin the chamber enough times,
translation.es: Esperas que, jugando a la ruleta rusa,

translation.en: Tomorrow morning, I'll meet you in Fitzroy Crossing.
translation.es: Mañana a la mañana, te veo en Fitzroy Crossing.

translation.en: If you're not sober, don't show up.
translation.es: Si no estás sobrio, no vayas.

translation.en: This is our extract. Ovi Mahajan, 14 years old.
translation.es: Este es nuestro sujeto de extracción. Ovi Mahajan, 14 años.

translation.en: His father, Ovi Mahajan Senior, is in jail.
translation.es: Es hijo de Ovi Mahajan, padre, que está preso.

translation.en: So, his people employed us to get the boy back,
translation.es: Nos contrataron para rescatar al chico.

translation.en: Amir Asif. Dhaka's very own Pablo Escobar.
translation.es: Amir Asif. El Pablo Escobar de Dacca.

translation.en: Biggest drug lord in India versus biggest drug lord in Bangladesh.
translation.es: El mayor narco de India contra el mayor narco de Bangladés.

translation.en: A lot of bad blood between them.
This is our extraction point. So, José and Thiago will man a boat,
translation.es: Este es nuestro punto de extracción. José y Thiago tripularán un barco,

translation.en: ferry you and the kid nine miles down the river to a chopper.
translation.es: te llevarán junto con el chico hasta un helicóptero a 15 km.

translation.en: - Any questions? - How many hostiles on site?
Maybe 20. Okay, clock is ticking. Let's chop- chop!
You see the laundry across the street?
You show me the kid's all right, I tell my people, they pay you.
translation.es: Si el chico está bien, pagaremos.

translation.en: Listen, you boys seem like real busy professionals,
so let's say we cut this shit and get down to business, yeah?
translation.es: Basta de tonterías y vayamos al grano.

translation.en: Hey, man, you're crazy or what?
stick in his ass and blow his insides out.
translation.es: ...se lo meto por el culo y le vuelo las tripas.

translation.en: No! No, Amir, no! Amir, no!
Anybody feel like they remember now?
I know who took the money. Who?
You just threw him off the roof.
You need to be smart. Use your wits.
translation.es: Hay que ser listo. Usar la inteligencia.

translation.en: Cut off two of your fingers.
Because the kid who stole from me is dead.
translation.es: Porque el chico que me robó está muerto.

translation.en: And I'd like a walking reminder
of what happens when you touch my money.
translation.es: de lo que pasa cuando tocan mi dinero.

translation.en: So you can still hold a gun.
or you'll lose more than just a finger.
translation.es: Si no, perderá más que un dedo.

translation.en: Kid, you wanna survive, you do exactly as I say.
translation.es: Si quieres sobrevivir, haz todo lo que diga.

translation.en: Here. Eat this. Your blood sugar is low, that's why you feel like shit.
translation.es: Come. Te falta azúcar. Por eso te sientes mal.

translation.en: Twenty- one hundred meters out. In possession.
Copy. Alpha team is with the boat. In position.
translation.es: Entendido. Equipo Alfa, en barco. En posición.

translation.en: Say your bloody name, come on.
Satellite's online. Rake and the kid are on route.
translation.es: El satélite está en línea. Rake y el chico, en camino.

translation.en: You guys ready for us? We're 1,600 meters out.

translation.es: - ¿Fecha de nacimiento? - El 21 de enero de 2005.

translation.en: You have seven minutes to transfer the funds.
translation.es: Tienen siete minutos para transferir fondos.

translation.en: There's an alarm going off in the engine room.
translation.es: Suena una alarma en la sala de máquinas.

translation.en: - G, I need you to be my eyes. - Copy that.
translation.es: - G, necesito que seas mis ojos. - Entendido.

translation.en: Blockades have been set up on every bridge into and out of Dhaka.
translation.es: Se pusieron bloqueos en todos los puentes de Dacca.

translation.en: I have teams combing the Buriganga as we speak.
translation.es: Tengo equipos registrando el río Buriganga ahora mismo.

translation.en: Get him a gun. Put his fingers to work.
translation.es: Dale un arma. Pon sus dedos a trabajar.

translation.en: Yeah, we gotta keep moving. Come on.
Rake's about five minutes from the boat.
translation.es: Rake está a cinco minutos del barco.

translation.en: Where are we at with the transfer?
- I don't know. - Well, try it again.
Call them back. Tell them they have 60 seconds to make the transfer.
translation.es: Llámalos de vuelta. Tienen 60 segundos para transferir.

translation.en: Or they'll find Ovi's body floating in the Buriganga.
translation.es: O el cadáver de Ovi flotará en el Buriganga.

translation.en: Tyler, something's wrong. Hold your position.
translation.es: Tyler, pasa algo. Mantén tu posición.

translation.en: G, you got eyes on the boat?
I'm looking at it right now. Our boys haven't come up yet.
translation.es: Estoy mirándolo. Los muchachos no aparecieron.

translation.en: I'm moving in for a closer look.
Colonel, stand by. We think we found something.
- Nik, you're gonna wanna see this. - What is it?
translation.es: - Nik, tienes que ver esto. - ¿Qué es?

translation.en: - Two hundred meters and closing in fast. - G?
There's someone else in those woods.
About a hundred meters out and closing in on your position.
translation.es: A unos 100 metros, acercándose a tu posición.

translation.en: Kid... Move fast. Stay low. Go!
We need air support by the river.
I'm here to take you home!
- Saju, I'm here! - Sit down and shut up!
I need the boy! I won't hurt him!
translation.es: ¡Necesito al niño! ¡No voy a hacerle daño!

translation.en: When I tell you to, run like hell or I'm gonna kill you both. Understand?
translation.es: Corre cuanto te diga, o los mataré a ambos, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: Go on, kid. Go, go! Go! Come on.
- Here, get in the car. Get in the car. - Stop running!
Please let me go! Saju works for my father.
I work for your father. But something is fucked here.
translation.es: Yo trabajo para tu papá, pero algo está mal.

translation.en: Saju could have a deal with the men who grabbed you and send you back to them.
translation.es: Saju puede tener un trato con tus captores.

translation.en: - Then take me to the police. - The cops are in on it.
translation.es: - Llévame a la policía. - Son parte.

translation.en: Look, if you wanna live, you have to trust me.
translation.es: Si quieres vivir, confía en mí.

translation.en: I need eyes. Radio's compromised. Call my sat.
translation.es: Necesito ojos. Radio, afectada. Usen el satelital.

translation.en: - How far past the gate? - What gate?
- Turn right. - Can't. Bloody truck is in the way.
translation.es: - A la derecha. - No puedo. Hay un camión.

translation.en: No, no, no! Left! You just passed it.
- Put your belt on. - What belt?
It's been on. You drive like you're insane!
We gotta move. Go. Up the stairs.
Get up the stairs. Go. Come on. Move!
All right, kid. Do you trust me?
Stay on my shoulder, all right?
Get in, kid. Come on. Come on!
- You hit him with the truck. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Lo atropellaste con el camión. - Sí.

translation.en: All right, kid. I need you to slide on over here.
Okay, we're gonna jump on three. All right?
translation.es: Saltamos a la cuenta de tres.

translation.en: The vehicle crashed. It flipped over and is in flames.
translation.es: El vehículo chocó. Se dio vuelta y se incendió.

translation.en: I want to see the bodies.
I want every gun in Dhaka pointed at this guy.
translation.es: Quiero a toda arma de Dacca apuntándole a este tipo.

translation.en: All right. Close the door. Close it.
Can you give me a hand?
I need a hand. Hold that on there.
translation.es: Necesito un par de ojos. Sostén esto.

translation.en: Just hook it through there and then pull it back this way.
translation.es: Pon esto aquí y tira hacia allá.

translation.en: Our new friend is Saju Rav. Ex- Special Forces.
translation.es: El nuevo es Saju Rav, ex Fuerzas Especiales.

translation.en: He works for the kid's father.
translation.es: Trabaja para el padre del chico.

translation.en: Mahajan got us to do the heavy lifting and he doesn't wanna pay.
translation.es: Mahajan nos hizo hacer el trabajo pesado y no quiere pagar.

translation.en: - City's on lockdown. You got cover? - Yeah.
translation.es: - La ciudad está cerrada. ¿Estás cubierto? - Sí.

translation.en: There's a clearing on east side of Sultana Kamal Bridge,
translation.es: Hay un claro en el puente Sultana Kamal.

translation.en: just outside the city. We can send a chopper and get you out.
translation.es: Es saliendo de la ciudad. Podemos enviarles un helicóptero.

translation.en: You gotta leave the kid behind, Tyler.
Are you gonna leave me in the street?
The only chance of getting my money is you, mate. So... no.
translation.es: Eres la única oportunidad para que reciba mi dinero, así que no.

translation.en: Piano. I play the piano when I'm nervous.
translation.es: Piano. Toco el piano cuando estoy nervioso.

translation.en: My father hates it when I do it.
translation.es: Mi padre odia cuando lo hago.

translation.en: He thinks of me the same way you do.
translation.es: Me considera lo mismo que tú.

translation.en: More like a thing than a person.
I didn't... I didn't mean it like that.
If you don't hear from me in the next 12 hours...
translation.es: Si no oyes de mí en las próximas 12 horas...

translation.en: When you wake up in the morning.
You got a chopper. Meet you at the east side of the bridge.
translation.es: Tienes un helicóptero del lado este del puente.

translation.en: - Hey, this guy wants my gun! - My ankle is broken!
translation.es: - ¡Este tipo quiere mi arma! - ¡Me rompí el tobillo!

translation.en: My friend is gonna shoot you!
Hey! Give me my gun... Give it back!
That's my gun, give it back to me!
- Give it back or I'll blow you away! - I will finish you off.
- - Fuck! Come on. We gotta move.
Stop or we will have to shoot.
We just got attacked by the goonies from hell. We made it about four blocks.
translation.es: Nos atacaron los goonies del infierno. Hicimos cuatro cuadras.

translation.en: I said get rid of the kid.
I don't give a shit what you said.
We're in the worst smelling sewer on the planet.
There's about 200 cops over our heads. Just call Gaspar.
translation.es: Tenemos 200 policías encima. Llama a Gaspar.

translation.en: Tyler, I don't think that's a good idea.
The guy owes me his life, Nik.
translation.es: Él me debe la vida, Nik.

translation.en: I appreciate you coming for us.
What the hell is wrong with you? Don't insult me.
translation.es: ¿Qué carajo te pasa? No me insultes.

translation.en: We are south of the city center.
translation.es: Estamos al sur del centro de la ciudad.

translation.en: I told Nik that an extraction is... It's not feasible.
translation.es: Le dije a Nik que una extracción no era factible.

translation.en: Well, you know, the city is surrounded by rivers.
translation.es: La ciudad está rodeada de ríos.

translation.en: There are bridges going in and out.
But every one of those bridges currently is blocked by a roadblock
translation.es: pero todos están bloqueados en este momento

translation.en: because you are a very popular individual.
translation.es: porque eres un individuo muy popular.

translation.en: I figure we lie low a couple days, we let the panic dissipate.
translation.es: Permaneceremos ocultos unos días hasta que el pánico baje.

translation.en: And we'll get you going. Now, my wife made that.
translation.es: Luego los pondremos en marcha. Mi esposa hizo esto.

translation.en: So, I want you to be very careful what you say.
translation.es: Ten mucho cuidado con lo que dices.

translation.en: And what's that for, the knee?
Hang on one sec... my knee. Ow! Oh, God. Oh, it hurts.
translation.es: Espera un poco... La rodilla. Dios, cómo duele.

translation.en: Okay. I gotta go. I gotta go.
But you stay here and rest up. And I will be back.
It's good to see you, man. I missed you.
Tell them to scour the market.
I want to be the one to pull the trigger.
If you let me do that,
I'll give you the other finger!
He made me feel like a fool.

translation.es: Te daré un consejo, un obsequio.

translation.en: Because no matter how badass you think you are...
translation.es: Porque por más rudo que te creas,

translation.en: there's always a badass who's bigger than you.
translation.es: siempre hay alguien más rudo que tú.

translation.en: If you had been killed today, it would have been my fault.
translation.es: Si te hubieran matado hoy, habría sido mi culpa.

translation.en: No, mate. But it would've been my fault.
translation.es: No, amigo, la culpa habría sido mía.

translation.en: You don't look like a Tyler.
That's not what I was going to ask. That's a strange last name, though.
translation.es: No iba a preguntar eso. Igualmente es un apellido extraño.

translation.en: Isn't that like a gardening tool?
What were you gonna ask me?
If you were always this way. You know... brave.
Of course you are. You rescue people.
Yeah, sometimes. Sometimes I do other things.
translation.es: A veces. Otra veces, hago otras cosas.

translation.en: My father, he kills people, too.
Sometimes, I would sit with him at dinner, look at him and think,
translation.es: A veces me siento con él en la cena... ...lo miro y pienso...

translation.en: he just killed somebody else's father that day.
translation.es: ...que, ese día, mató a algún otro padre.

translation.en: I did have me a wife.
I don't know. I haven't seen her in a long time.
translation.es: No sé. Hace mucho que no la veo.

translation.en: He died a few years ago.
I wasn't even there... when he died.
translation.es: Ni siquiera estaba ahí cuando murió.

translation.en: Kandahar, Afghanistan. It was my third tour.
translation.es: En Kandahar, Afganistán. Era mi tercer servicio.

translation.en: I told you, mate. I'm not brave. I'm just...
translation.es: Te dije, no soy valiente. Solo soy...

translation.en: You drown not by falling into the river,
translation.es: Te ahogas no por caer en el río...

translation.en: but by staying submerged in it.
I read it in a book in school.
translation.es: Lo leí en un libro escolar.

translation.en: It's the best dove hunting in Argentina.
translation.es: Gran caza de palomas en Argentina.

translation.en: Just lie in this pool... You lie in a pool and they fly around!
translation.es: Me acostaba en la piscina, y ¡volaban alrededor!

translation.en: And you sip a Cuba Libre.
I shot my first dove when I was ten years old. Have I told you this?
translation.es: Tenía diez años cuando le disparé a mi primera paloma. ¿Te lo conté?

translation.en: - I haven't. Listen. - I think you have.
No. It was when I was ten years old, my dad... My dad... The gun backfired,
translation.es: No, fue cuando tenía diez años. Mi papá... El arma reculó,

translation.en: gave me a black eye, and my dad laughs at me.
translation.es: me dejó un ojo amoratado, y mi papá se rio de mí.

translation.en: I used to move so quick, kill those little shits.
translation.es: Yo era muy rápido, mataba a esas infelices.

translation.en: It sucks getting old, man. Sucks! - Getting old sucks. - Shh.
translation.es: Es una mierda envejecer. ¡Carajo! ¡Es una mierda!

translation.en: That kid is a walking corpse.
translation.es: Ese chico es un cadáver ambulante.

translation.en: Asif will never let him live.
I mean, you get him home. And then, what? His father's in prison.
translation.es: Lo llevas a su casa. ¿Y luego qué? Su padre está preso.

translation.en: There's no way to protect him.
You know, the best thing you could do, honestly,
translation.es: Lo mejor que podrías hacer, francamente,

translation.en: would be to go up there right now and just go put a bullet in his brain.
translation.es: sería ir ahí ahora y pegarle un tiro en la cabeza.

translation.en: 'Cause the animals out there, they're not gonna be... as kind to him.
translation.es: Porque los animales allá afuera no serán tan buenos con él.

translation.en: They like to start with the ears.
Then they cut off each finger at the joint.
translation.es: Luego cortan todos los dedos de tajo.

translation.en: You know how much he's worth?
We're talking about a kid, Gaspar.
We're talking about a gangster's kid.
translation.es: Sí, el hijo de un gánster.

translation.en: With a price tag of ten million on his head.
You need to sober up, mate.
You're a mercenary, right, Tyler? Why don't you act the mercenary?
translation.es: Eres un mercenario, ¿no, Tyler? Actúa como tal.

translation.en: Aren't you sick of this life? 'Cause I am and I...
translation.es: ¿No estás harto de esta vida? Porque yo sí...

translation.en: I do not wanna end it playing hero on some goddamn suicide mission--
translation.es: No quiero terminarla haciéndome el héroe en una maldita misión suicida...

translation.en: What are you doing? You said you'd help me.
I am helping you. Ten million dollars.
translation.es: Te estoy ayudando. Diez millones de dólares.

translation.en: I'll get you to the border in a couple hours.
It's money in your pocket. I take care of the body. Painless.
translation.es: Es dinero en el bolsillo. Yo me ocupo del cuerpo. Indoloro.

translation.en: And it's the best that that kid can hope for.
translation.es: Es lo mejor para ese chico.

translation.en: - Did you call someone? Who'd you call? -
Why are you such a hypocrite? You've got the blood of a hundred men on your hands--
translation.es: ¿Por qué eres tan hipócrita? Mataste a 100 hombres...

translation.en: Do you know happens to me if they find out that I'm helping you?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué me pasará si descubren que te ayudo?

translation.en: Do you know what happens to my wife?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué le pasará a mi esposa?

translation.en: I did some work for him. We made a deal.
translation.es: Hice trabajos para él. Hicimos un trato.

translation.en: He gets the kid, you get your freedom, and we both get rich.
translation.es: Él tiene al chico, tú tienes tu libertad. Y ambos somos ricos.

translation.en: What do you want from me? You want me to walk upstairs and shoot him in the head?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que suba y le dispare en la cabeza?
Me salvaste la vida una vez.

translation.en: What are we doing, man? Huh?
I know it looks bad. I know it looks bad.
I've got the boy. I need your help.
translation.es: Tengo al chico. Necesito tu ayuda.

translation.en: I want the boy out of here. That's all I care about.
translation.es: Lo único que me importa es sacarlo de aquí.

translation.en: He was gonna kill my family if I didn't get his son back.
translation.es: Él iba a matar a mi familia si no traía a su hijo.

translation.en: My people are waiting for him on the other side of the Sultana Kamal bridge.
translation.es: Mi gente espera por él del otro lado del puente Sultana Kamal.

translation.en: There's two blockades between here and there.
translation.es: Hay dos bloqueos en el camino.

translation.en: I'll do my best to draw them away from both.
You get him to the other side.
We'll have to go on foot.
Hey! I'm telling you to stop!
- Take his hat off. Let me see his face. - Huh?
translation.es: Quítale la gorra. A ver la cara.

translation.en: Take two more units to the bridge.
Two units to the bridge. Hurry!
translation.es: Dos unidades al puente. De prisa.

translation.en: Stay here. Stay down. I'm gonna draw them away from you.
translation.es: Quédate aquí agachado. Los alejaré de ti.

translation.en: Rake, I need you on the bridge!
In hiding. About halfway across the bridge.
I'm trying to clear a path.
Fuck! I'm taking fire. Abort. I'm going around.
translation.es: ¡Mierda! Me disparan. Voy a dar la vuelta.

translation.en: I need you to run as fast as you can for it.
translation.es: Corre lo más rápido posible hacia él.

translation.en: Bogeys are down. LZ clear. Two- minute window.
translation.es: Enemigos eliminados. Pista despejada. Dos minutos.
